messages.title: FAIR IS WORTH FIGHTING FOR
messages.content: Matt Sellwood lives in Stoke Newington, and is a writer and campaigner. A former councillor, Matt is a volunteer with a social enterprise that works with adults facing housing and mental health issues, and is completing a PhD on community land trusts.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Green MPs will demand a 'Living Wage' to ensure low paid workers earn enough to provide for themselves and their families. Will fight for a fair financial deal, with community banks, credit unions and mutuals providing realistic loans to families and small businesses.

Green MPs will press for a free insulation scheme for every single home and for a green package to cut fuel bills and create a million new jobs. Green Party councillors have already pioneered such a scheme in Kirklees.
Green MPs will fight to make sure local services are easy to access and are truly local. Will oppose cuts, closures and privatisation within the NHS and protect the jobs of public sector workers.

mentions.partyLeader: Caroline Lucas MEP, Leader of the Green Party

issues.health: Green MPs will fight to make sure local services are easy to access and are truly local. Will oppose cuts, closures and privatisation within the NHS and protect the jobs of public sector workers.
